infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We need your location to calculate shipping costs and provide relevant product recommendations.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to upload product images and scan items.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app accesses your photo library to select and upload product images.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app saves product images to your photo library.
